thread.section_title: American Frame americanframe.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Frame americanframe.com | www.americanframe.com
thread.title: William
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by William

author: William
title: William
text: I've been ordering from American frame off and on for many years. Their personalized service (how often do you receive a handwritten letter in the mail thanking you for your order?) and willingness to ship to overseas (US Military) addresses a great plus. The orders are always right and their website ensures that when building a frame and borders you end up with the correct measurements. Being able to "see" your picture online with the framing is a super plus.
